name: Neon Spaceboard
detailed_description:
About this game:

Neon SpaceBoard is a game with retro style. It's a runner on third person and you try to fight your way dodging asteroids and shooting bosses. There are powers to use like missiles and a shield that protects you from damage. It haves a town called “Red planet” with RPG features and you can get upgrades and talk with the characters.

It's the first development of an independent team.






Story:

Bebetta is a intrepid space boarder girl. She awakens on a mysterious place named “Red Planet”.Without any explanation she explores the world by locating portals and teleporting to certain levels .She needs to defeat all the bosses to finally find the answers of this place.

Red planet haves many different characters to interact , mini games to solve and regions to explore.



Game mecanics:

You can walk on “Red Planet2”, explore and play some mini games, talk with some characters and enter the levels. There are also many sections that will need you to complete all levels to open.

You have a life-bar that decreases when you take damage(by colliding with asteroids or with boss projectiles).Picking the color spheres will give you powers to defend yourself from asteroids and bosses.

Bosses need to be damaged by projectiles to be defeated.






Biography:

Federico Jimenez wanted to develop his own project, he likes to skate and the psychedelic things .A year before graduating ,he started working on the project concept. Development and production started soon afterwards.
On a gaming jam , he meet Tirso Hernandez and the idea grew into development for steam,marketing,level design ,game-play and dialogs. Soon afterwards Brenda Macias joined the team to make the voice acting. When the game was in need for more music tracks , Miguel Sandoval provided some tracks to complete the requirement.

short_description:
Neon Spaceboard is an independent video game of psychedelia and extreme space sports.
You are a spaceboarder girl trapped in a strange reality. Discover the secrets of this atypical universe with the help of your slate, magical gems, you care and clues of unusual characters.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 770 / AMD Radeon™ R9 270
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 3 GHz Quad-Core 64-bit CPU
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce® GTX 960 / AMD Radeon™ R9 280 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
